assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Retrospective analysis of existing data sets from routine patient care does not require institutional review board approval under national law and applicable institutional regulations.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All carriers underwent DNA-based screening and standard operations for MEN2A-associated tumors after informed consent according to applicable diagnostic and therapeutic standards (routine patient care).

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Not applicable (aggregate data only, no patient level data).
